summary: K12 CBSE education platform (GloriusCyberSchool.com) - rebuilding existing Google Sites website for Internet Computer
architectural_notes: Project is a rebuild of existing Google Sites website
Target audience: K12 CBSE education students
Course subjects confirmed: Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, Social Studies
School address: Glorious Cyber School Lauwadih
Authentication requirements: Mobile number login and Google login in addition to Internet Identity
Fee structure: ₹500 per month or ₹4800 annually

existing_features.title: Create a home page that showcases the K12 CBSE education platform with sections for featured courses, about the school, and call-to-action buttons for enrollment
Implement a courses listing page that displays K12 CBSE courses organized by grade levels (Class 1-12) with course titles, descriptions, and difficulty indicators
Create individual course detail pages that show course content, syllabus, learning objectives, and enrollment options for each K12 CBSE subject
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to allow students and teachers to log in and access personalized content
Create an about page that describes Glorious Cyber School's mission, vision, and approach to K12 CBSE education

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, education-focused colors (orange, green, and cream tones), clean typography suitable for educational content, and a layout that emphasizes accessibility for K12 students and parents
Render generated images including school logo, educational illustrations for course categories, and hero banner as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Update the frontend course card icons to display subject-specific icons for Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, and Social Studies
Update the Footer component to display the school address as 'Glorious Cyber School Lauwadih' and contact number as '8922056968'
Update the About page to include the school address 'Glorious Cyber School Lauwadih' and contact number '8922056968' in the contact section
Create a student enrollment page in the frontend that displays an enrollment form with fields for student name, grade level, and course selection, accessible to authenticated users

Create a fee payment page in the frontend that displays fee options (₹500 per month and ₹4800 per year), allows users to select payment type, shows payment summary, and processes payment through the backend
Add a payment history section to the dashboard page that displays all past payments for the logged-in student including payment date, amount, payment type, and status
Update the Header component navigation to include links to the new Enrollment and Fee Payment pages

Update the frontend Courses page to properly display all populated courses by fetching data from the backend getCourses endpoint and rendering course cards with titles, descriptions, grade levels, and difficulty indicators

Update the frontend CourseDetail page to fetch and display actual course content including title, description, syllabus, learning objectives, and enrollment button from the backend getCourseById endpoint
Update the frontend Home page FeaturedCourses section to display actual courses fetched from the backend instead of showing an empty state

new_feature_requests.summary: K12 CBSE education platform with courses and content

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, and Social Studies subjects across all grade levels (Class 1-12)

Add school address (Glorious Cyber School Lauwadih) and contact number (8922056968) to the website
Add fee payment system with monthly (₹500) and annual (₹4800) options

Create a backend data model for student enrollment that includes student information (name, grade level, enrolled courses, enrollment date) and stores enrollment records persistently in the Motoko actor
Create backend functions to handle student enrollment operations including submitting enrollment for a course, retrieving enrollment status by student, and listing all enrollments for a course

Create a backend data model for fee structure that stores monthly fee of ₹500 and annual fee of ₹4800, and maintains fee payment records including payment amount, payment date, payment type (monthly/annual), and payment status
Create backend functions to handle fee payment operations including initiating payment, recording payment completion, retrieving payment history for a student, and checking payment status

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for Mathematics across all grade levels (Class 1-12), including course titles, descriptions, syllabus content, learning objectives, and difficulty indicators appropriate for each grade level

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for Science across all grade levels (Class 1-12), including course titles, descriptions, syllabus content, learning objectives, and difficulty indicators appropriate for each grade level

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for English across all grade levels (Class 1-12), including course titles, descriptions, syllabus content, learning objectives, and difficulty indicators appropriate for each grade level

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for Hindi across all grade levels (Class 1-12), including course titles, descriptions, syllabus content, learning objectives, and difficulty indicators appropriate for each grade level

Populate the backend course database with actual course entries for Social Studies across all grade levels (Class 1-12), including course titles, descriptions, syllabus content, learning objectives, and difficulty indicators appropriate for each grade level
Deploy the current draft version to production on the Internet Computer, making it publicly accessible with a permanent URL
